name: Feedly - Dark n Flat
description: Feedly needed to be darker and flatter.
additional_info:
Tried to make it dark and a little easier on the eyes to read. Still not sure if I like the contrast between the font and background

v1.1 - More tweaks, css compressed by 17%
v1.0 - Tweaks, and updates to address changes to feedly layout
v0.8 alpha - More minor tweaks, accounted for some changes in feedlys pages recently, added some support for feed settings page, also reduced file size by about 20%
v0.7 alpha - more tweaks
v0.6 alpha - bugfixes, edits to search, box-shadow adjustment
v0.5 alpha - bugfix, minor tweaks
v0.4 alpha - More transitions, holy easing batman!
v0.3 alpha - some more transitions and minor tweaks
v0.2 alpha - more stuff
v0.1 alpha - initial release
